org.apache.flink.python.api

类 PythonOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.python.api.PythonOptions

  • public class PythonOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration options for the Python API.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> DATA_TMP_DIR
      The config parameter defining where the memory-mapped files will be created.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> DC_TMP_DIR
      The config parameter defining where the flink python library and user supplied files will be uploaded to before registering them with the Distributed Cache.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> MMAP_FILE_SIZE
      The config parameter defining the size of the memory-mapped files, in kb.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> PLAN_TMP_DIR
      The config parameter defining where temporary plan-related files are stored on the client.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> PYTHON_BINARY_PATH
      The config parameter defining the path to the python binary to use.

    • 字段详细资料

      • PYTHON_BINARY_PATH

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> PYTHON_BINARY_PATH
        The config parameter defining the path to the python binary to use.

      • MMAP_FILE_SIZE

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> MMAP_FILE_SIZE
        The config parameter defining the size of the memory-mapped files, in kb. This value must be large enough to ensure that the largest serialized record can be written completely into the file.

        Every task will allocate 2 memory-files, each with this size.

      • PLAN_TMP_DIR

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> PLAN_TMP_DIR
        The config parameter defining where temporary plan-related files are stored on the client.

      • DATA_TMP_DIR

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> DATA_TMP_DIR
        The config parameter defining where the memory-mapped files will be created.

      • DC_TMP_DIR

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> DC_TMP_DIR
        The config parameter defining where the flink python library and user supplied files will be uploaded to before registering them with the Distributed Cache. This directory must be accessible from all worker nodes.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • PythonOptions

        private PythonOptions()
